column2: Who was the most interesting person I interacted with today?
column3: My friend Pedro after many years.

column2: What was the best part of my day?
column3: Going out with my family for a walk.

column2: How did I see the hand of the Lord in my life today?
column3: Today I received a lot of inspiration to do my homework.

column2: What was the strongest emotion I felt today?
column3: I felt joy seeing my son trying hard to carry out his responsibilities.

column2: If I had one thing I could do over today  what would it be?
column3: Play with my son and teach him how to drive a bicycle.
